entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
